moves.name: X Sp. Def
moves.effect: Raises the user’s Sp. Def by 2 stat ranks.

moves.name: Let’s Brainstorm!
moves.effect: Raises the Sp. Atk and Speed of all allied sync pairs by 1 stat rank.

moves.name: Psybeam
moves.effect: Has a chance (10%) of leaving the target confused.

passives.name: Clearheaded
passives.description: Prevents the user from becoming confused.

passives.name: Natural Remedy
passives.description: Removes all status conditions from the user the first time it is inflicted by any status condition each battle.

passives.name: Quick Cure
passives.description: Removes the confused, flinching, and trapped conditions from the user the first time they are inflicted each battle.
